short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facilitates Easy Copy Responses and Converts Responses into Notes for references

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With ChatNote, you can effortlessly save your ChatGPT responses to the clipboard and download them as text files for future reference. Whether you are using ChatGPT for research, learning, or entertainment, ChatNote ensures that your valuable interactions are always at your fingertips. Experience seamless note-taking and stay organized with ChatNote.
